statements: SELECT * FROM new_citizens;
SELECT id, age, gender FROM new_citizens WHERE country_of_origin = 'USA';
SELECT gender, age FROM new_citizens WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT country_of_origin, COUNT(*) AS count FROM new_citizens GROUP BY country_of_origin;
SELECT * FROM new_citizens WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY country_of_origin DESC;
SELECT id, age, gender, country_of_origin FROM new_citizens WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, gender FROM new_citizens WHERE country_of_origin = 'USA' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, age, country_of_origin FROM new_citizens WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY country_of_origin, age;
SELECT * FROM new_citizens WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 30 ORDER BY id ASC, age DESC;
SELECT country_of_origin, COUNT(*) as total_citizens FROM new_citizens GROUP BY country_of_origin HAVING total_citizens > 1 ORDER BY total_citizens DESC, country_of_origin ASC;
SELECT * FROM Citizens;
SELECT citizen_id, age FROM Citizens WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM DemographicData WHERE residence_status = 'Permanent Resident';
SELECT citizen_id, occupation, residence_status FROM DemographicData WHERE occupation = 'Engineer';
SELECT citizen_id, gender, country_origin FROM Citizens ORDER BY gender DESC;
SELECT * FROM Citizens WHERE age > 25 AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY citizen_id DESC;
SELECT country_origin, COUNT(*) FROM Citizens GROUP BY country_origin HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT c.country_origin, d.occupation FROM Citizens c INNER JOIN DemographicData d ON c.citizen_id = d.citizen_id WHERE c.age < 30;
SELECT c.age, d.occupation, d.residence_status FROM Citizens c LEFT JOIN DemographicData d ON c.citizen_id = d.citizen_id WHERE c.age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM Citizens;
SELECT * FROM Citizens;
SELECT citizen_id, age, gender FROM Citizens WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Residences WHERE city='New York';
SELECT * FROM Demographics ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT country_of_origin, COUNT(*) FROM Citizens GROUP BY country_of_origin;
SELECT * FROM Citizens WHERE age > 30;
SELECT citizen_id, age, gender FROM Citizens WHERE country_of_origin = 'USA';
SELECT R.address, R.city, D.population FROM Residences R INNER JOIN Demographics D ON R.residence_id = D.demographic_id;
SELECT C.country_of_origin, D.median_age FROM Citizens C INNER JOIN Demographics D ON C.citizen_id = D.citizen_id WHERE D.population > 100000;
SELECT * FROM Citizens ORDER BY gender ASC, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Citizens;
SELECT id, age FROM Citizens WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT country_of_origin, age FROM Citizens WHERE age > 30;
SELECT occupation_title, language_name FROM Occupations INNER JOIN Languages ON Occupations.citizen_id = Languages.citizen_id;
SELECT city, state, zip_code FROM Addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Citizens;
SELECT id, age FROM Citizens WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT id, country_of_origin FROM Citizens WHERE age > 30;
SELECT c.id, a.city, a.state FROM Citizens c INNER JOIN Addresses a ON c.id = a.citizen_id WHERE a.zip_code='12345';

SELECT c.id, o.occupation_title, l.language_name FROM Citizens c LEFT JOIN Occupations o ON c.id = o.citizen_id LEFT JOIN Languages l ON c.id = l.citizen_id WHERE o.occupation_title='Engineer' AND l.fluency_level='Advanced';
SELECT * FROM citizens;
SELECT citizen_id, age, gender, country_of_origin FROM citizens WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM citizens WHERE country_of_origin = 'USA';
SELECT citizen_id, age, gender FROM citizens ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT country_name, COUNT(citizen_id) AS citizen_count FROM citizens JOIN countries ON citizens.country_of_origin = countries.country_name GROUP BY country_name;
SELECT * FROM citizens ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC
SELECT citizen_id, country_of_origin FROM citizens WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM citizen_history WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT c.*, g.gender_name FROM citizens c JOIN genders g ON c.gender = g.gender_name
SELECT c.citizen_id, a.group_name FROM citizens c JOIN age_groups a ON c.age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY c.citizen_id ASC
